topic.title: Reason For Referral Section - conformance rules

section.p: A Reason for Referral section records the reason the patient is being referred for a consultation by a provider. An optional Chief Complaint section may capture the patient's description of the reason for the consultation.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="42349-1" REASON FOR REFERRAL (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:7845)
